@@ -0,0 +1,198 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:background="@drawable/snow"
+    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/memory_screen"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="150dp"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/main_screen"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        tools:text="0.0" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/main_screen"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="150dp"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_9"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        tools:text="0.0" />
+
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_7"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_7"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_8"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/main_screen" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_8"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_8"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/button_9"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_7"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/main_screen" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_9"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_9"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_multi"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_8"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/main_screen" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_multi"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_multi"
+        android:textColor="#FF5722"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/button_text"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_9"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/main_screen" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_4"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_4"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_5"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_7" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_5"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_5"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/button_6"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_4"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_8" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_6"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_6"
+       app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_share"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_5"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_9" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_share"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_share"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_6"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_multi" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_1"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_1"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_2"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_4" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_2"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_2"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/button_3"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_1"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_5" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_3"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_3"
+       app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_plus"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_2"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_6" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_plus"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_plus"
+       app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_3"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_share" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_0"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_0"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_equals"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_1" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_equals"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_equals"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/button_erase"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_0"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_2" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_erase"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="resetCalculator"
+        android:text="@string/_erase"
+       app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/button_minus"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_equals"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_3" />
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/button_minus"
+        style="@style/ButtonCals"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:onClick="press"
+        android:text="@string/_minus"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_erase"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/button_plus" />
+
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,16 +0,0 @@
-<resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
-    <!-- Base application theme. -->
-    <style name="Theme.CalculaterSerg" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar">
-        <!-- Primary brand color. -->
-        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_200</item>
-        <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item>
-        <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/black</item>
-        <!-- Secondary brand color. -->
-        <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item>
-        <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_200</item>
-        <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item>
-        <!-- Status bar color. -->
-        <item name="android:statusBarColor" tools:targetApi="l">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item>
-        <!-- Customize your theme here. -->
-    </style>
-</resources>

 <resources>
-    <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color>

-    <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color>

 </resources>

@@ -10,10 +10,11 @@
     <string name="_8">8</string>
     <string name="_9">9</string>
     <string name="_0">0</string>
-    <string name="_point">.</string>
     <string name="_plus">+</string>
     <string name="_minus">-</string>
     <string name="_multi">*</string>
     <string name="_share">/</string>
     <string name="_equals">=</string>
+    <string name="_erase">C</string>
 </resources>
+

@@ -0,0 +1,10 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<resources>
+       <!-- Base application theme. -->
+        <style name="SergTheme" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.DarkActionBar">
+        </style>
+            <style name="ButtonCals" parent="@style/Widget.AppCompat.Button.Borderless">
+                <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/button_text</item>
+                <item name="android:textColor">@color/button_text</item>
+        </style>
+</resources>
\ No newline at end of file
